title: Acciaioly (Filipe Joaquim)
body: Colonel and aide-de-camp to the Governor and Captain General of Madeira, José Lúcio Travassos Valdez, when he took refuge aboard the war corvette Alligator. He was indicted, while absent, by the jurisdiction that came to Madeira in 1828.

José Lúcio Travassos Valdez: Governor and Captain General of Madeira

1828: Indicted by the jurisdiction that came to Madeira
